NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Movies and Commercialization or the cell corresponding to Gaming and Diversity?

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Social Media and Innovation or the cell corresponding to Travel and Preservation?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Social Media} and {Innovation} has a higher heat value.

MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.12 to 0.34?
MSR.A: The cells are: {(Art, Adoption), (Fashion, Adoption), (Gaming, Adoption), (Language, Adoption), (Fashion, Commercialization), (Gaming, Commercialization), (Art, Critique), (Fashion, Critique), (Fashion, Diversity), (Art, Innovation), (Fashion, Innovation), (Fashion, Localization), (Gaming, Localization), (Fashion, Popularity), (Gaming, Popularity), (Art, Preservation), (Gaming, Preservation), (Language, Preservation), (Movies, Preservation)}.
